visual.name: Drill_Down_Graph_PRO_By_ZoomCharts
visual.displayName: Drill Down Graph PRO (Filter) by ZoomCharts

dataRoles.name: fromNodes
dataRoles.description: Field containing an ID of from node. An ID should not contain spaces.

dataRoles.name: toNodes
dataRoles.description: Field containing comma separated Target node IDs of target nodes. An ID of the node should not contain spaces.

dataRoles.name: Size
dataRoles.description: This field will be used to determine the value and size of the nodes

dataRoles.name: sourceNodeImageField
dataRoles.description: The field for source node images. Only base64 encoded image content is displayed (URI that starts with data:image/<format>;base64).

dataRoles.name: sourceNodeColorField
dataRoles.description: Field for 'dynamic' node color mode. In 'dynamic' mode a color from this field will be used. Please note that supported color format is: 'hex', 'rgb', 'rgba', 'css colors'

dataRoles.name: sourceNodeLabelField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a source node label. If left blank, node id will be displayed.

dataRoles.name: nodeShapeField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting node shape. Values are taken from data column provided.

dataRoles.name: categoryClassField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a category class to be used. Category class must be written as 'category1', 'category2' up to 'category9'. Up to 9 category classes are supported.

dataRoles.name: sourceFocusNodes
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a source focus nodes. Values must be '0' or '1', where '0' - not a focus node, '1' - is a focus node.

dataRoles.name: sourceNodeAuras
dataRoles.description: Auras around nodes. Values need to be separated by ',', for example, aura1, aura2, aura3, etc.

dataRoles.name: targetNodeImageField
dataRoles.description: The field for target node images. Only base64 encoded image content is displayed (URI that starts with data:image/<format>;base64).

dataRoles.name: targetNodeColorField
dataRoles.description: Field for 'dynamic' node color mode. In 'dynamic' mode a color from this field will be used. Please note that supported color format is: 'hex', 'rgb', 'rgba', 'css colors'

dataRoles.name: targetNodeLabelField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a target node label. If left blank, node id will be displayed.

dataRoles.name: targetNodeShapeField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting node shape. Values are taken from data column provided.

dataRoles.name: targetCategoryClassField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a category class to be used. Category class must be written as 'category1', 'category2' up to 'category9'. Up to 9 category classes are supported.

dataRoles.name: targetFocusNodes
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a target focus nodes. Values must be '0' or '1', where '0' - not a focus node, '1' - is a focus node.

dataRoles.name: targetNodeAuras
dataRoles.description: Auras around nodes. Values need to be separated by ',', for example, aura1, aura2, aura3, etc.

dataRoles.name: linkColorField
dataRoles.description: Field for 'dynamic' link color mode. In 'dynamic' mode a color from this field will be used. Please note that supported color format is: 'hex', 'rgb', 'rgba', 'css colors'

dataRoles.name: linkLabelField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a link label. This label should be a numeric value as the values for the same link will be summed together. If left blank there will be no link label displayed

dataRoles.name: linkLabelTextField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a link label. This label should be a textual value. If left blank there will be no link label displayed

dataRoles.name: linkCategoryClassField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a category class to be used. Category class must be written as 'linkCategory1', 'linkCategory2' up to 'linkCategory9'. Up to 9 category classes are supported.

dataRoles.name: linkWidthField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting link width. Link width is dynamically calculated based on the values.

dataRoles.name: linkDefinesLayout
dataRoles.description: Field that configures whether the target node inherits the hierarchy of its source node. Default - 1/true. If set to 0/false, the hierarchy is ignored and the target node is placed on the first level. This is only relevant in layout modes where hierarchy is observed, e.g. 'Hierarchy'.

dataRoles.name: nodePopupContentFields
dataRoles.description: Field for setting source node tooltip content, tooltip will be shown on right click.

dataRoles.name: targetNodePopupContentFields
dataRoles.description: Field for setting target node tooltip content, tooltip will be shown on right click.

dataRoles.name: linkPopupContentFields
dataRoles.description: Field for setting link tooltip content, tooltip will be shown on right click.

trialLicense.description: Currently, this block is meant to be hidden.

info.description: Turn off to hide the info button. The info button can only be removed if a paid license is detected.

preview.description: Hidden field, only enabling it from a theme to allow some functionallity.

hideProperties.description: Hidden field, provide values delimited with ',' from a theme to hide properties.

nodeLoadLimit.description: Maximum number of nodes to be loaded. Higher number of nodes requires more powerful GPU to keep the visual responsive. Min value: 0, Max value: 100000.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

orientation.description: Orientation of how hierarchy will be drawn.

nodeSorting.description: When enabled, tries to sort nodes to reduce link crossings

radialNodeSpacing.description: Spacing between nodes. Min value: 0, Max value: 1000.

hNodeSpacing.description: Horizontal spacing between nodes. Min value: 0, Max value: 1000.

vNodeSpacing.description: Vertical spacing between node rows in the hierarchy layout. Min value: 0, Max Value: 1000.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

initialFocusNodeExpansionRadius.description: Number of "levels" to automatically expand around the most recently focused node. Min value: 0, Max value: 100

focusNodeExpansionRadius.description: The number of levels of nodes to expand from the clicked node

rightClick.description: Behavior, which happens, when right clicking a node, i. e., either to show 'Default Context Menu' or 'Power BI Context Menu'

nodes.description: Settings used for all nodes by default.

shape.description: Set the default node shape. If Node Shape is set to 'Dynamic' under Node Category X settings, this shape will also be used for nodes of the respective categories, unless overridden by Source Node Shape or Target Node Shape fields.

showImages.description: Show/hide source and target node images.

colorMode.description:
'Auto' - visual automatically assigns different colors for each category
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab
'No fill' - will remove any color on node

minRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

maxRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

showValueAffixes.description: Whether to use affixes or not (e.g. currency)

hideNodes.description: Hide nodes that are only target nodes

links.description: Settings used for all links by default.

colorMode.description:
'Auto' - color is set to black
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'Dynamic' - color is set according to the data supplied in the Link Color field. If the field is not configured or the data is blank, color is set to black.

multilinkSpacing.description: Distance between multiple links between two nodes.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

rotateLabelWithLink.description: If turned on, link labels will be rotated to match link angle.

multiLinkProcessor.description: Aggregate multiple links between two nodes - numeric values are added together and the first textual value is displayed

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

urlLength.description: When hyperlink comes from 'Tooltip Content' or/and 'Link Tooltip Content' fields, then limit to length.

expandAll.description: Whether to show the `Expand All` button in the toolbar

collapseAll.description: Whether to show the `Collapse All` button in the toolbar

unhideNodes.description: Unhide nodes that have been hidden using the context menu 'Hide' function. This button only appears after at least one node is hidden.

category1.description: Enable or disable customization of Node Category #1

shape.description: Set the node shape for this category. 'Dynamic' will use the shape selected under Nodes (Default Category), unless overridden by Source Node Shape or Target Node Shape fields.

colorMode.description:
'Auto' - visual automatically assigns different colors for each category
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab
'No fill' - will remove any color on node

minRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

maxRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

insideLabelsFontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

outsideLabelsFontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

textSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

linkCategory1.description: Enable or disable customization of Link Category #1

colorMode.description:
'Auto' - color is set to black
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'Dynamic' - color is set according to the data supplied in the Link Color field. If the field is not configured or the data is blank, color is set to black.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

rotateLabelWithLink.description: If turned on, link labels will be rotated to match link angle.
